All less then 2 minutes walk from our house.<br/><br/>This Impressive 5 bedroom, 4 bathrooms near ocean home will be an unforgettable vacation retreat for the whole family! The spacious great room is breathtaking with its wood floors, high ceilings, &amp; crown molding. The living room is complete with a fireplace (no gas hooked up) &amp; a 56&quot; Smart TV and DVR over the wood mantel-bring your Netflix or other account to watch thousands of movies, access Amazon, and many other websites.  In addition, for your enjoyment, we have a beautiful leather sectional couch that seat seven people. Off the living area is the Gourmet kitchen with breakfast bar for 4, granite counter-tops, cherry wood cabinets, a water filtration system in the kitchen sink, &amp; Stainless Steel appliances. This Sunny great room also has a formal dining area with a handsome oriental rug and table that seats six. Additionally, you can enjoy the adjacent area complete with iron &amp; glass dining table, great for game playing with the family or for enjoying your morning coffee.  This house is professionally decorated and is the perfect setting for a memorable summer vacation or winter retreat.<br/><br/>The main floor master bedroom offers Tranquility in its decor with a queen sleigh bed, with flat panel TVs, and a large luxurious tiled bath. There is also a full service Laundry Room on the Main floor complete with a Washer and Dryer. <br/><br/>UPSTAIRS in the master bedroom, you&#x27;ll be delighted to discover a striking king carved wood bed with flat panel TV. Open sliders to find a private balcony to enjoy the morning or afternoon breeze and finally the wonderful stone and marble master bath decked out with an over-sized spa tub and an over-sized tiled Shower with sitting area and sliding glass door! A very nice full bath is shared between the 3rd &amp; 4th bedroom. Both bright &amp; cheerful bedrooms have beautiful queen beds with flat panel TVs! The 5th bedroom is also complete with its own luxuries! You&#x27;ll find a fine queen bed with flat panel TV and a gleaming, tiled separate hall bath! <br/><br/>There first level offers a full bathroom adjacent to the first level master suite and the second level offers three full bathrooms with a huge master bathroom suite.<br/><br/>Outside is a 9&#x27;x 22&#x27; private pool that is out in the sunshine not covered under the house, enclosed cedar outdoor shower with privacy to clean up when coming back from the beach and before enjoying your private swimming pool.  Lovely private fenced backyard.<br/><br/>We have a full size table that seats 6 on the pool deck.  In addition, there is a 3 person adult swing to relax while the kids enjoy the pool. <br/><br/>Additionally, we have a box of toys for kids to enjoy while they are at the house.  One High Chair and a sleep and play will provide comfort for your little one.<br/><br/>Our Tommy Bahama beach chairs, umbrella, and beach cart will allow you to carry less stuff when you stay with us.<br/><br/>*The beach, via Singleton Beach Road, is approximately a 3 minute bike ride over a beautiful expansive salt marsh with wild birds and crabs. uitk-text-spacing-two overflow-wrap uitk-type-300 uitk-text-default-theme"><div data-stid="content-markup"><div class="uitk-text uitk-type-300 uitk-text-default-theme">Our property is managed by us, the owners. We first traveled to South Carolina in 2008, and stayed in a house in the very same neighborhood where we now own a property. Our family fell in love with the security and privacy provided by the gated community, the charming, Spanish-inspired style of the houses, and the countless amenities in and around the house. The wonderful experiences we have had in Hilton Head over the years prompted us to try and share those experiences with others. As full-time employees and parents, we realize that hard-working people have little time to get away these days and deserve a great vacation with their friends and family, including their four legged friends.</div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-stid="content-item" class="uitk-layout-grid-item uitk-layout-grid-item-has-column-start" style="--uitk-layoutgrid-column-start:span 1"><div class="uitk-layout-flex uitk-layout-flex-gap-six"><div class="uitk-layout-flex-item uitk-layout-flex-item-max-width-full_width uitk-layout-flex-item-flex-grow-1"><h3 class="uitk-heading uitk-heading-5" tabindex="-1">Why they chose this property</h3></div></div><div class="uitk-layout-grid uitk-layout-grid-has-auto-columns uitk-layout-grid-has-space uitk-layout-grid-display-grid" style="--uitk-layoutgrid-auto-columns:minmax(var(--uitk-layoutgrid-egds-size__0x), 1fr);--uitk-layoutgrid-column-gap:var(--uitk-layoutgrid-space-two);--uitk-layoutgrid-row-gap:var(--uitk-layoutgrid-space-two)"><div class="uitk-layout-grid-item"><div class="uitk-text uitk-text-spacing-two overflow-wrap uitk-type-300 uitk-text-default-theme"><div data-stid="content-markup">This property has easy access to the main road and to many family-friendly activities. One short, three minute drive brings you to grocery stores, restaurants, and a shopping center. Take a morning walk on the beach with your kids and collect sand dollars and sea shells. Chaplin Park is a two minute walk away and has a playground, a dog park, and a free tennis courts. We have a free seasonal shuttle that takes your family to and from the beach. The beach is a five minute walk away or you can park right next to a beach path in a lot three tenths of a mile from the house in Chaplin Park. <br/><br/>Relax by the pool or on the balcony off the master bedroom. There is also a balcony off the breakfast room to enjoy your morning coffee or tea. Have fun and make many family memories playing or having barbecues by the private pool. Afterwards, you can use the closed-off shower area for a convenient way to get off any chlorine or sand. .</div></div></div></div></div><div data-stid="content-item" class="uitk-layout-grid-item uitk-layout-grid-item-has-column-start" style="--uitk-layoutgrid-column-start:span 1"><div class="uitk-layout-flex uitk-layout-flex-gap-six"><div class="uitk-layout-flex-item uitk-layout-flex-item-max-width-full_width uitk-layout-flex-item-flex-grow-1"><h3 class="uitk-heading uitk-heading-5" tabindex="-1">What makes this property unique</h3></div></div><div class="uitk-layout-grid uitk-layout-grid-has-auto-columns uitk-layout-grid-has-space uitk-layout-grid-display-grid" style="--uitk-layoutgrid-auto-columns:minmax(var(--uitk-layoutgrid-egds-size__0x), 1fr);--uitk-layoutgrid-column-gap:var(--uitk-layoutgrid-space-two);--uitk-layoutgrid-row-gap:var(--uitk-layoutgrid-space-two)"><div class="uitk-layout-grid-item"><div class="uitk-text uitk-text-spacing-two overflow-wrap uitk-type-300 uitk-text-default-theme"><div data-stid="content-markup"><div class="uitk-text uitk-type-300 uitk-text-default-theme">Easy access to many great restaurants and stores. The beach is very safe for our youngest family members, as there are no sudden drop offs in water depth. At low tide the beach is about 200 yards wide and you can mountain bike on the sand. The golfing at Palmetto Dunes, half a mile away, is amazing. Golf and see the ocean. For a less expensive golfing experience, Hilton Head National off-island is perfect. My family loves to shop at the two Tanger Outlets nearby in Bluffton. Great dining and many family friendly activities on Hilton Head Island at night, such as fireworks and musical performances from local artists. Restaurants have great food and reasonable prices, or, if you prefer to eat in, the house has a well-equipped kitchen for your enjoyment as well as a gas and charcoal grill.</div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="uitk-layout-grid-item uitk-layout-grid-item-has-column-start-by-medium uitk-layout-grid-item-has-column-start-by-large" Off the living area is the Gourmet kitchen with breakfast bar for 4, granite counter-tops, cherry wood cabinets, a water filtration system in the kitchen sink, & Stainless Steel appliances. This Sunny great room also has a formal dining area with a handsome oriental rug and table that seats six. Additionally, you can enjoy the adjacent area complete with iron & glass dining table, great for game playing with the family or for enjoying your morning coffee. A very nice full bath is shared between the 3rd & 4th bedroom. Both bright & cheerful bedrooms have beautiful queen beds with flat panel TVs! The 5th bedroom is also complete with its own luxuries! You'll find a fine queen bed with flat panel TV and a gleaming, tiled separate hall bath! \\u003Cbr\\u003E\\u003Cbr\\u003EThere first level offers a full bathroom adjacent to the first level master suite and the second level offers three full bathrooms with a huge master bathroom suite.\\u003Cbr\\u003E\\u003Cbr\\u003EOutside is a 9'x 22' private pool that is out in the sunshine not covered under the house, enclosed cedar outdoor shower with privacy to clean up when coming back from the beach and before enjoying your private swimming pool.
